alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:10PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lander County through 445 PM PDT... At 408 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Battle Mountain, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Lander County, but includes portions of NV-305. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
